entries.text: CBK annual reports and financial statements summarize economic and financial indicators, with analysis and commentary on the Kenyan economy.

entries.text: The weekly bulletin is released every week and provides a brief summary on a range of economic and financial indicators.

entries.title: Monetary Policy | CBK
entries.text: Monetary policy is decisions to ensure money supply aligns with growth and price objectives, aiming to maintain price stability and low inflation.
